content.text:
Yes, I can execute code using the Bash tool. I can run commands, scripts, and programs in the terminal environment. This includes:

- Running build commands (`npm run build`, `npm test`, etc.)
- Executing scripts and utilities
- Running linters and formatters
- Git operations
- Package management commands
- Custom scripts and tools

I can also read, write, and edit files, so I can modify code and then execute it to test the changes.
